site_name: Christchurch Church Of England Primary School Cotherstone RoadLondonSW2 3NF
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x Cherry tree (T2) -tidy poor pruning stubs, crown thin 20% to improve form (Summer pruning only), 1 x Holly tree (T8) - reduce height by 1m and trim spread to retain compact form, 1 x Sessile Oak tree (T9) - crown reduce height and spread by branch lengths of up to 2.5m to suitable branch unions not beyond previous reduction points, 1 x Ash sapling (T11) - fell to ground level and grind out stump, 1 x Lime tree (T12) - crown reduce height by branch lengths of up to 3.0m to suitable branch unions not beyond previous reduction points, crown reduce spread up to 1.5m branch lengths, remove major deadwood, remove basal epicormic growth, 1 x Lime tree (T13) - crown reduce height by branch lengths of up to 3.0m to suitable branch unions not beyond previous reduction points, crown reduce spread up to 1.5m branch lengths, remove major deadwood, remove basal epicormic growth, 1 x Lime tree (T14) re-pollard removing all epicormic growth, 1 x Horse chestnut (T15) - remove major deadwood, 1 x Lime tree (T16) - crown reduce height and spread by branch lengths of up to 2.5m to suitable branch unions, remove major deadwood, remove all epicormic and trunk growth to 4m height, 1 x Lime tree (T17) - crown reduce height and spread by branch lengths of up to 2.5m to suitable branch unions, remove major deadwood, remove all epicormic and trunk growth to 4m height.
